Summary: I saw one bright light come to me, then swittched to the left fast revolving white and silver, then behind out house later I saw two.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
divs: Sighting DetailsI looked out of my front window about 9:30 pm I saw a bright light come toward me tree level. I thought it was a helicopter, it was not. it was very bright then turned to the right at roof top level. it was a silver and white with a red bottom. later I looked out my back thinking the should be coming there later. there it was, it shot up and turned into a bright blue light twice and vanished.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around March 17th 2009
